con:configuration.script: def sdf = new java.text.SimpleDateFormat("yyyy-MM-dd") return sdf.format(new Date()) + "T08:59:00.000-04:00"

con:request.name: SubmitPPIPaymentUsingWallet
con:request.con:request: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:ws="https://www.velocitypayment.com/ws" xmlns:ppi="http://www.ePayments.com/PPI" xmlns:ppip="http://www.ePayments.com/PPIPayment">\r <soapenv:Header/>\r <soapenv:Body>\r <ws:SubmitPPIPaymentUsingWallet>\r <!--Optional:-->\r <ws:token>\r <!--Optional:-->\r <!--Optional:-->\r <ppi:UserName>${DataSourcePaymentUsingWallet#AT_Username}</ppi:UserName>\r <!--Optional:-->\r <ppi:Password>${DataSourcePaymentUsingWallet#AT_Password}</ppi:Password>\r <!--Optional:-->\r <ppi:PPITransactionRequestId>${DataSourcePaymentUsingWallet#AT_RequestID}</ppi:PPITransactionRequestId>\r <ppi:PPIBusinessEntityIdentifierToken>${DataSourcePaymentUsingWallet#AT_Identifier}</ppi:PPIBusinessEntityIdentifierToken>\r </ws:token>\r <!--Optional:-->\r <ws:ppiWalletPayment Notes="${DataSourcePaymentUsingWallet#Notes}">\r <!--Optional:-->\r <ppi:AdditionalInfo>\r <!--Zero or more repetitions:-->\r <ppi:Fees>\r <ppip:FeeType>${DataSourcePaymentUsingWallet#FeeType}</ppip:FeeType>\r <ppip:Amount>${DataSourcePaymentUsingWallet#FeeAmount}</ppip:Amount>\r </ppi:Fees>\r <!--Zero or more repetitions:-->\r <!--Zero or more repetitions:-->\r <ppi:PaymentSegment>\r <ppip:Amount>${DataSourcePaymentUsingWallet#SegmentAmount}</ppip:Amount>\r <ppip:SegmentType>${DataSourcePaymentUsingWallet#SegmentType}</ppip:SegmentType>\r <!--Optional:-->\r </ppi:PaymentSegment>\r <!--Optional:-->\r <ppi:PaymentType>${DataSourcePaymentUsingWallet#PaymentType}</ppi:PaymentType>\r <ppi:ProcessDate>${DataGenProcessDate#ProcessDateToday}</ppi:ProcessDate>\r <!--Zero or more repetitions:-->\r </ppi:AdditionalInfo>\r <!--Optional:-->\r <ppi:Customer>\r <!--Optional:-->\r <!--Optional:-->\r <ppi:AddressLine1>${DataSourcePaymentUsingWallet#C_AL1}</ppi:AddressLine1>\r <!--Optional:-->\r <ppi:AddressLine2>${DataSourcePaymentUsingWallet#C_AL2}</ppi:AddressLine2>\r <!--Optional:-->\r <ppi:Country>${DataSourcePaymentUsingWallet#C_Country}</ppi:Country>\r <!--Optional:-->\r <ppi:EmailAddress>${DataSourcePaymentUsingWallet#C_Email}</ppi:EmailAddress>\r <!--Optional:-->\r <ppi:FirstName>${DataSourcePaymentUsingWallet#C_FirstName}</ppi:FirstName>\r <!--Optional:-->\r <ppi:LastName>${DataSourcePaymentUsingWallet#C_LastName}</ppi:LastName>\r <!--Optional:-->\r <ppi:MiddleInitial>${DataSourcePaymentUsingWallet#C_MI}</ppi:MiddleInitial>\r <!--Optional:-->\r <ppi:Notes>${DataSourcePaymentUsingWallet#C_Notest}</ppi:Notes>\r <!--Optional:-->\r <ppi:PhoneNumber>${DataSourcePaymentUsingWallet#C_Phone}</ppi:PhoneNumber>\r <!--Optional:-->\r <ppi:Zip>${DataSourcePaymentUsingWallet#C_ZIP}</ppi:Zip>\r <!--Optional:-->\r <ppi:Username>${DataSourcePaymentUsingWallet#C_Username}</ppi:Username>\r <ppi:Password>${DataSourcePaymentUsingWallet#C_Password}</ppi:Password>\r </ppi:Customer>\r <ppi:ClientAccountNumber>${DataSourcePaymentUsingWallet#C_CAN}</ppi:ClientAccountNumber>\r <!--Optional:-->\r <ppi:PreAuthorizeOnly>${DataSourcePaymentUsingWallet#C_PreAuthOnly}</ppi:PreAuthorizeOnly>\r <ppi:PaymentSource>${DataSourcePaymentUsingWallet#C_PaymentSource}</ppi:PaymentSource>\r <ppi:WalletID>${DataSourcePaymentUsingWallet#WalletID}</ppi:WalletID>\r <ppi:PaymentAccountToken>${DataSourcePaymentUsingWallet#PaymentAcToken}</ppi:PaymentAccountToken>\r <!--Optional:-->\r <!--Optional:-->\r </ws:ppiWalletPayment>\r </ws:SubmitPPIPaymentUsingWallet>\r </soapenv:Body>\r </soapenv:Envelope>
